actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Community Services Block Grant Act to provide a Federal set-aside for comparison food shopping services.

summary.text: Amends the Community Services Block Grant Act (title VI of the Omnibus Budget Reconciliation Act of 1981) to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to establish a program under which consumers in at least 70 cities are provided comparison food shopping information. Requires at least $2,600,000 of appropriations to be set aside for this program.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Community Services Block Grant Act to provide a Federal set-aside for comparison food shopping services.
